title: Software Engineer
description: Wrote clean, well tested and maintainable code for the cloud-based internal system, mainly working with Python, Django, and PostgreSQL. Integrated 3rd party APIs and extensive use of Django REST APIs framework.

title: CAO Systems Specialist
description: Monitored the administration and upkeep of a centralized SQL Server and Oracle Database supporting ordering, inventory, and forecasting systems for 750+ stores across three prominent supermarket brands. As a side project, I created internal tools/applications using Python, still used today by the team.

title: Shift Lead / Photo Specialist
description: Managed a team of three to merchandise products, manage store inventory, and order stock. Trained and supervised new associates and managers on store procedures and policies.
